name: Tom Bombadil's House
description:
Theme – The Interchange

This scene was inspired by the interchange in the book ‘The Fellowship of the Ring’ (Tolkien, 1954), when the hobbits are invited to Tom Bombadil’s house.

I chose to design my own set for the purposes of this challenge, and this means that I’ve spent more time and attention on designing rather than modelling. I have used Quixel Megascan assets to flesh out many aspects of the house. These assets are made clear in my unreal engine project. Thankyou for viewing my report!

One ‘centrepiece’ focal object - Table

One large decorative piece - Curtains

One supporting prop – Lilly pad bowls

One architectural statement / structural piece – Design of Tom Bombadil’s house
